snippet.title: From Marlboro Man to Electronic Cigarette Man
snippet.description: * From Marlboro Man to Electronic Cigarette Man Yes, my father has really stopped smoking. I sometimes call him Carlos Contreras who is Charles Contrary with Contreras being a real Latin surname. I call him this because isn’t interesting that he has stopped smoking now that I blog about his COPD? ...

snippet.title: Burning Ben: Crohn's in the Desert
snippet.description: * Burning Ben: Crohn's in the Desert Burning Man seemed like the worst possible place for a Crohn’s patient to be, even the name sounded like what my rear end feels like after a bad meal. snippet.title: Inspirational Stories: Organ Donation Saved My Life
snippet.description: * Inspirational Stories: Organ Donation Saved My Life One afternoon in May 2006, I was sitting at my desk when all my assistant managers came into the office.
